description: Zef Eisenberg smashed more than 50 speed records in his customised cars and motorbikes.
title: Zef Eisenberg: The millionaire who pushed the boundaries of speed
title_page: Zef Eisenberg: The millionaire who pushed the boundaries of speed - BBC News
maintext: "You go through some pretty nasty thoughts in your head, you know? And then you start thinking do I want to bike again, is that the right thing to do?" he said the following year when he announced his return to racing.
